params._periodId: Identification number of the period which fees are claimed for

params._feeAmount: Initial amount of fees to be paid for each subscription period
params._feeToken: Initial ERC20 token used for the subscription fees
params._governorSharePct: Initial permyriad of subscription fees that will be allocated to the governor of the Court (‱ - 1/10,000)
params._latePaymentPenaltyPct: Initial permyriad of subscription fees that will be applied as penalty for not paying during proper period (‱ - 1/10,000)
params._periodDuration: Duration of a subscription period in Court terms
params._prePaymentPeriods: Initial number of periods that can be paid in advance including the current period
params._resumePrePaidPeriods: Initial number of periods a subscriber must pre-pay in order to resume his activity after pausing

params._amount: Amount of fee tokens to be donated

params._periodId: Identification number of the period being ensured

ensurePeriodBalanceDetails(uint256).return: periodBalanceCheckpoint Court term ID used to fetch the total active balance of the jurors registrytotalActiveBalance Total amount of juror tokens active in the Court at the corresponding used checkpoint

getController().details: Tell the address of the controller

getCurrentPeriod().details: Get details of the current period
getCurrentPeriod().return: feeToken Fee token corresponding to a certain subscription periodfeeAmount Amount of fees paid for a certain subscription periodbalanceCheckpoint Court term ID of a period used to fetch the total active balance of the jurors registrytotalActiveBalance Total amount of juror tokens active in the Court at the corresponding period checkpointcollectedFees Total amount of subscription fees collected during a period

getCurrentPeriodId().details: Tell the identification number of the current period
getCurrentPeriodId().return: Identification number of the current period

getDelayedPeriods(address).details: Tell the number of overdue payments for a given subscriber

params._subscriber: Address of the subscriber being checked

getDelayedPeriods(address).return: Number of overdue payments for the requested subscriber

getJurorShare(address,uint256).details: Tell the share fees corresponding to a juror for a certain period

params._juror: Address of the juror querying the owed shared fees of
params._periodId: Identification number of the period being queried

getJurorShare(address,uint256).return: feeToken Address of the token used for the subscription feesjurorShare Amount of share fees owed to the given juror for the requested period

getOwedFeesDetails(address).details: Tell the minimum amount of fees to pay and resulting last paid period for a given subscriber in order to be up-to-date

params._subscriber: Address of the subscriber being queried

getOwedFeesDetails(address).return: feeToken ERC20 token used for the subscription feesamountToPay Amount of subscription fee tokens to be paid for all the owed periodsnewLastPeriodId Identification number of the resulting last paid period

getPayFeesDetails(address,uint256).details: Tell the amount to pay and resulting last paid period for a given subscriber paying for a certain number of periods

params._periods: Number of periods that would be paid
params._subscriber: Address of the subscriber being queried

getPayFeesDetails(address,uint256).return: feeToken ERC20 token used for the subscription feesamountToPay Amount of subscription fee tokens to be paidnewLastPeriodId Identification number of the resulting last paid period

getPeriodBalanceDetails(uint256).details: Tell total active balance of the jurors registry at a random term during a certain period

params._periodId: Identification number of the period being queried

getPeriodBalanceDetails(uint256).return: periodBalanceCheckpoint Court term ID used to fetch the total active balance of the jurors registrytotalActiveBalance Total amount of juror tokens active in the Court at the corresponding used checkpoint

getSubscriber(address).details: Tell information associated to a subscriber

params._subscriber: Address of the subscriber being queried

getSubscriber(address).return: subscribed True if the given subscriber has already been subscribed to the Court, false otherwisepaused True if the given subscriber has paused the Court subscriptions, false otherwiselastPaymentPeriodId Identification number of the last period paid by the given subscriberpreviousDelayedPeriods Number of delayed periods the subscriber had before pausing

hasJurorClaimed(address,uint256).details: Check if a given juror has already claimed the owed share fees for a certain period

params._juror: Address of the juror being queried
params._periodId: Identification number of the period being queried

hasJurorClaimed(address,uint256).return: True if the owed share fees have already been claimed, false otherwise

isUpToDate(address).details: Tell whether a certain subscriber has paid all the fees up to current period or not
isUpToDate(address).return: True if subscriber has paid all the fees up to current period, false otherwise

params._periods: Number of periods to be paid in total since the last paid period
params._to: Subscriber whose subscription is being paid
Address of the recipient that will be receive all the funds of the requested token

params._periods: Number of periods to be paid in total

params._feeAmount: New amount of fees to be paid for each subscription period

setFeeToken(address,uint256).details: Accumulated fees owed to governor (if any) will be transferred

params._feeAmount: New amount of fees to be paid for each subscription period
params._feeToken: New ERC20 token to be used for the subscription fees

params._governorSharePct: New permyriad of subscription fees that will be allocated to the governor of the Court (‱ - 1/10,000)

params._latePaymentPenaltyPct: New permyriad of subscription fees that will be applied as penalty for not paying during proper period

params._prePaymentPeriods: New number of periods that can be paid in advance

params._resumePrePaidPeriods: New number of periods a subscriber must pre-pay in order to resume his activity after pausing

claimFees(uint256).notice: Claim proportional share fees for period `_periodId` owed to `msg.sender`

ensurePeriodBalanceDetails(uint256).notice: Make sure that the balance details of a certain period have been computed

payFees(address,uint256).notice: Pay fees on behalf of `_to` for `_periods` periods

setFeeAmount(uint256).notice: Set new subscriptions fee amount to `_feeAmount`

setPrePaymentPeriods(uint256).notice: Set new number of pre payment to `_prePaymentPeriods` periods

setResumePrePaidPeriods(uint256).notice: Set new resume pre-paid periods to `_resumePrePaidPeriods`

transferFeesToGovernor().notice: Transfer owed fees to the governor
